Reading in data regarding pokemon.

```{r}
pokemon_df <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2025/2025-04-01/pokemon_df.csv')
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(pokemon_df, aes(x = type_1)) +
  geom_bar()
```
